groups.com
Subject: [cantera] Problems using importphase

Hi!
I am using ca=
ntera in MATLAB to calculate kinetics. I've already made
some experiences i=
n converting CK-Mechanisms with ck2cti and importing
them with importphase.=

As I wantet to create an own mechanism combining those for isooctane and
n=
heptane (from LLNI) and for Toluene (from Massachusetts Institute of
Techno=
logy Department of Chemical Engineering,
http://web.mit.edu/anish/www/MITco=
mb.html).
After removing those reactions, which where identified by ck2ctml=
 to be
undefined duplicated I tried to load the mechanism using importphase=
.
There have been some more reactions with 'M' or in different order,
which=
 still have been undefined duplicated. I commented them, too.

Now MATLAB s=
eems to hang up, because there aren't any error messages,
but nothing happe=
ns when I'm trying to import the Phase:

ck2cti('prf_2d_mech.txt','prf_2d_t=
herm.txt') % works
gas=3DimportPhase('prf_2d_mech.cti'); % PC hangs up :-(
=

Do you have any suggestions to fix the problem??? Thanks a lot.

By the wa=
y: 
Is it able to disabe the warnings for incontinuities of thermodynamic
p=
roperties at the middle of the temperatur-interval.
And:
Do you know any li=
nks for more mechanisms concerning petrol combustion.

Thank you very much
=
